metadata.title: CVE-2021-47315 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: memory:fsl_ifc: fix leak of IO mapping on probe failure On probe error the drivershould unmap the IO memory. Smatch reports: drivers/memory/fsl_ifc.c:298fsl_ifc_ctrl_probe() warn: 'fsl_ifc_ctrl_dev->gregs' not released on lines:298.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
